name: realworld-vibe-coding
description: > A full-stack RealWorld application built with Go backend and React frontend using Vibe Coding methodology.

scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && go vet ./... && go fmt ./...
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && go build -o server cmd/server/main.go
